title: COMPENDIUM FUERZA DE UNICIDAD ENERGETICA EN ESTADO TRANSPARENTE
author: José Martín Talllón
description: DESCRIPCION SOBRE ECUACIONES TRANS CUANTICAS TRANSPARENTES FISICA CUANTICA EINSTEINIANA FISICA CUANTICA TESLESIANA AXIOMA PRIMERO Todo ion positronado se sincro-positrona mediante La reconvertivilidad circulativa designistitutiva en la Reconversión

2022, FUERZA DE UNICIDAD ENERGETICA EN ESTADO TRANSPARENTE
DESCRIPCION SOBRE ECUACIONES TRANS CUANTICAS TRANSPARENTES FISICA CUANTICA EINSTEINIANA FISICA CUANTICA TESLESIANA AXIOMA PRIMERO Todo ion positronado se sincro-positrona mediante La reconvertivilidad circulativa designistitutiva en la Reconversión Fronterigmatica de transición Supragible Siendo esta igual a el resoligma de resolución del paradigma por oposición negativa contradictoria (Desde los principios trans-cuánticos-transparentes) (Trans-matemáticamente es) La secuencia numeral de conjugación sagrada 0 2 4 8 Sobre los básicos numerales del ante-siglo 3 6 9 que por Abducción da 04 posinon sobre reconlatitiva Siendo igual a dos ion positrones más dos sincronitrones Sobre cero resoligma o reconlatitiva que por sustracción Da cero resoligma AXIOMA SEGUNDO La trans-matemática holística sobre la matemática clásica es igual a la trans-cuántica-transparente siendo esta igual a la física cuántica einsteniana mas menos la física cuántica teslesiana sobre la trans-cuántica transparente corresponde su igualdad a la trans cuántica transparente al cuadrado de igual es la trancuantica transparente más la fuerza del campo cardio neuro electro magnético siendo igual al fronterigma de supragibilidad AXIOMA TERCERO El fronterigma de supragibilidad es trigometricamente igual al plano material de su anclaje básico dividiendo por otro lado la dimensión espiritual superior y en el medio la linea de transición habitada por los siete versos ( inverso – reverso – transverso – holosverso – Metaverso – proverso – converso ) y los números “T” siendo igual a la física cuántica einsteniana mas la física cuántica telesniana en su base la linea de transición los siete versos más infinitos y en la superior la trans-cuántica-transparente en números seria de base 3 6 9 En la linea de transición los valores a los versos más 0 2 4 8 siendo la secuencia numeral de conjugación sagrada y en la superior la trans-cuántica-transparente más los números “t” AXIOMA CUARTO En la base del plano material el positrón en la superior el ion en el fronterigma de supragibilidad el sincrotrón en números por trans-aducción da un verso siendo la resolución en la base de valor transparente en la superior uno y en el fronterigma de supragibilidad verso CONCLUSION EN CUANTO A LA ECUACION NUEVEGONOMETRICA EN TRES NIVELES DE INTERPRETACION TANTO MATEMATICA CLASICA MAS CUANTICA AL CUADRADO (EINSTEINIANA Y TELESIANA) MAS LA TRANSCUANTICATRANSPARENTE DA UN VERSO TRANSPARENTE SIENDO UNICIDAD ENERGETICA COSMICA EN COMUN UNION MULTIVERSAL
TRANSPERSONAL WORLD an introduction to the new paradigm I like to start with some reflections from my personal experience, for who revises the book I have a general idea about myself, and therefore buying the scope and limits of my thinking. Some years ago I met a Falun Dafa spiritual practitioner, I approached myself out of curiosity, I was interested in emphasizing the cultivation of the principles Truthfulness-Compassion-Forbearance and that included meditation exercises, I never really imagined how good it was for my life. Along with this, many of the scientific knowledge with which I was familiarizing, as well as I did in my daily life began to make sense, I seemed to discover a truth I had always known. At the same time, observing the disorientation of those who for the first time we came into contact with the transpersonal movement, we decided to synthesize and systematize some things with which I found myself. Only something basic, that would allow each one to follow its own way with an overview. Unexpectedly this project was creating, it gave me the impression that it was no longer just about transpersonal psychology, but that I was facing a whole transpersonal world that covered practically all areas of life. But I am aware of my limitations, the idea is that this document serves only as a source of references, where it is manifest a summary of the main characters and theoretical models of the transpersonal movement. In fact, most sources of information are accessible via the internet, and so it was easy for the reader in contrast to what was written with the sources. The text has been divided into several sections: in the first part give an overview of the transpersonal movement; Then I will briefly describe the religious and philosophical background; To dedicate a final and main section to describe some of the scientific currents of the Transpersonal World. The first chapters describe knowledge of general culture through a more relaxed and reflective narrative that helps to understand the ideas that are at the base of the transpersonal movement; Instead the last part describes how the transpersonal movement has been expressed in diverse currents and scientific disciplines, therefore uses a more rigorous language and is rich in quotations or references. Written on the contrary, as a journey from the subtle to the concrete, from the spirit to the applied sciences. Before this, I must make a warning, I hope that each of my words is an open question, otherwise it will not result to the reader so profitable. I do not take a privileged point of view, nor do I intend to show the vision of a specialist in each subject, nor do I pretend to be exhaustive or meticulous; Only from my humble position as a member of the human family, I tried to make sense of all this great cultural avalanche, which I call the transpersonal movement. Actually, this venture, is only a bit of sand ... is not an individual adventure or isolated, quite the contrary, as you see throughout the book many boys have participated in the construction of the transpersonal world.
